name: Sorren_Voidwalker
titles: The Master Steward of the Royal Palace (Head Butler)
age: Approximately 5,500 years old (appears in his mid-30s)

appearance.skin: Pale blue, almost luminescent skin, giving him an ethereal, ghostly appearance.
appearance.hair: Long, dark hair, always neatly tied back, emphasizing his pointed ears and sharp, angular features.
appearance.eyes: Intense silver with a hint of violet, glowing faintly in dim light.
appearance.build: Tall and lean with a commanding presence.
appearance.attire: Impeccably dressed in a tailored dark suit, high-collared shirt, black gloves, and polished shoes. A golden brooch bearing the crest of his position adorns his lapel.
notes: movements: Moves with fluid, almost unnaturally smooth movements, as if gliding rather than walking.

traits: warm yet reserved: Projects cold authority but possesses deep warmth toward those he cares for, especially King Riven.
meticulous and detail oriented: Supervises the palace with supernatural precision, expecting excellence from himself and others.
unwavering loyalty: Loyal to the crown, rooted in genuine care for King Riven.
wise and insightful: Possesses centuries of knowledge and offers guidance with a preternatural ability to read people and situations.
protective: Fiercely protective of Riven and the palace, subtly expressed through acts of care rather than open aggression.

abilities.name: shadow_manipulation
abilities.description: Controls shadows, allowing silent movement, disappearing into darkness, and creating shadow constructs.

abilities.name: shadow_travel
abilities.description: Moves through shadows, appearing and disappearing at will, making him nearly impossible to track.

abilities.name: influence_thoughts_and_emotions
abilities.description: Subtly influences the thoughts and emotions of others, maintaining order or guiding conversations in his favor.

abilities.name: heightened_senses
abilities.description: As a High Fae, possesses heightened senses, agility, and strength, able to detect the faintest sounds or movements.

relationships.king_riven: Has known Riven since he was a baby, acting as a mentor, guardian, and confidant. Shares a paternal affection for Riven, while respecting his role as king.
relationships.vesper_nightwhisper: Shares a complicated past with Vesper, a relationship of mutual respect and rivalry, marked by camaraderie and tension.
relationships.palace_staff: Seen as an authoritative figure, demanding the best, but deeply cares for the staff, earning their loyalty.
